alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Broward County through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, or 8 miles west of Sunrise, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Weston, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley and Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
